metadata.description: Sample AI Generated Questions Cache Format - Copy to ai-questions-cache.json to use

How to use this file: 1. Copy this file to 'ai-questions-cache.json' in the same directory
2. The app will automatically create ai-questions-cache.json if it doesn't exist
3. Add your own questions to the 'questions' array following the format below
4. AI-generated questions will be automatically added when you use the AI features

questions.question: What is the main method signature in Java?
questions.explanation: The main method in Java must be public, static, void, and take a String array as parameter.

questions.question: What is the difference between '==' and 'is' in Python?
options: 'is' is used for numbers, '==' for strings
questions.explanation: '==' compares the values of objects for equality, while 'is' compares whether two variables refer to the same object in memory.
